title: THEME PROVIDER - OPEN SOURCE PROJECT
content:
An easy to use, customizable Theme Provider plugin for Flutter. 
This provides app color schemes throughout the app and automatically rebuilds the UI dynamically. This can also persist the current color theme. This package provides several widgets that can help to easily add theme switching abilities.

title: GOOGONG SMART CITY COMMUNITY APP
content: A smart city app which allows users to find local community services, receive public announcements of events and upload public amenity faults supported by the smart city network in Googong, Australia. This was a cross-platform mobile application and a web application developed using Django and Flutter. This is an ongoing project.

title: CB3D WEBSITE - 3D PRINTING PORTAL
content: 3D printer website and administration portal with online order management and 3D file preview functionalities. Node.js, Express.js, React and PostgreSql were used to develop the system.

title: Rise of the Pharaohs Scavenger hunt app
content: Scavenger-hunt mobile app developed using 	extit{Flutter and Firebase} which was created as the invitation for the CSE event â€“ Rise of the Pharaohs.

title: Tic Tac Toe Playing Robot Arm | Created for XOBot Competition
content:
This was a vision based approach to developing a tic-tac-toe playing robot using Arduino and OpenCV.
This robot operates in 2 separate modules. An android app is used to identify the positions of balls(This version of tic-tac-toe uses green and red balls) on the board. The app then instructs the Arduino board to take the move.(The move is calculated using minimax algorithm) Then the arduino module uses the arm to play the turn.

This bot was able to win the runners-up position in XOBot Competition and this bot lost the final round by mere 3 seconds.

title: OPEN INVENTORY - INVENTORY MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
content: Automated inventory management system for computer labs with role-based access system. The system consisted of a mobile application and a web application. The web frontend was developed using React, Backend using Node.js/Express and mobile application using Flutter.

title: JAVA BASED RPAL INTERPRETER
content: RPAL interpreter implemented in Java which evaluates RPAL abstract syntax trees according to the RPAL grammar specification. Developed as part of the CS3152 Programming Languages module.

title: CLASSIFICATION OF ANOMALIES IN GASTROINTESTINAL TRACT THROUGH ENDOSCOPIC IMAGERY WITH TRANSFER LEARNING
content: Transfer Learning project done for the university module which uses transfer learning with pre-trained models such as inception, densenet, resnet34 in order to correctly detect the anomaly.

title: Teleport (App developed for the HackX competition)
content:
Teleport is an app which intends to use concepts of sharing economy in order to further transportation and logistics industry. 
This app was made using flutter and supports both iOS and android platforms.

title: MediKit WebApp & MobileApp - Semester 3 Group Project | Managing health-care services | e-prescriptions
content:
Pulse Health-care is a project initiated by the team Pulse with the intention of improving the doctor-patient interconnection and computerizing the health-care system. 
The main function of the platform is managing and storing medical data. Other than that the platform provides various type of services to its clients including doctor management facility and other medical center oriented facilities. 

This was a project done for semester 3 module Object-Oriented Software Development (17-S3-CS2062)

title: Piano Tiles Bot - Open Source Project
content: A hobby project I did which captures a window from an emulator and uses openCV to process the image and press according keys. This bot was intended to play piano tiles game and can reach 4000+ scores easily.

title: Project Medical | Simple mobile app for medical data search engine
content:
This application is a simple mobile application which enables users to get information about symptoms of a disease,medicine recommended for curing the disease and list of medical shops where user can get the medicines.
Project done for CS3022 - Software Engineering Module.

title: Neomerce | Single vendor e-commerce web application
content:
Single vendor e-commerce web application made for Semester 4 CS3042 Database Systems Module.
Allows buying products and report generation.

title: OS Scheduler Algorithm Simulator
content:
This is a simple web app/electron app to simulate the OS scheduler algorithms such as Round Robin/SJF/FCFS/SRTF. Uses canvas drawings and charts to demonstrate various statistics related to simulation. 

This was a project done for semester 3 module Operating Systems (17-S3-CS2042)

title: Capsolat
content: Designed the front end for a startup for a matrimonial web site. This is a Matrimonial Ad Portal where people can publish their Ad faster.

title: Decrypt 2.0 Website
content: Website for decrypt event 2019 organized by CSE17.
